column17:
Vera Wang Women Eau de Parfum - 100 ml Price: Rs.4150

The memory of an incredibly emotion-laden moment for a bride as she accepts the man of her dreams as her husband for life is one that she will cherish forever. This moment is beautifully translated into a fragrance that conjures up the images of the most important day of her life by the celebrated house of Vera Wang. The luxury Eau de Parfum captures the essence of her intimately passionate moment in time and tucks it away safely in her heart to draw from on a faraway day when she sits at the window seat and contemplates how far she has come since she said I do.

In 2002 Jean-Claude Delville and Harry Fremont penned a poem for the blushing bride at the zenith of her union in the form of Vera Wang Woman. The deep redolence of Calla lily mingles with the light notes of intimate gardenia and the scent that sends your senses spinning into a tizzy is sealed with a kiss of sweet sensuous nectar.Â The exquisite fragrance crafted with utmost care is wrapped in the embrace of a luxurious flacon created under the special guidance of Swarovski house. As the beautiful bride walks down the aisle towards the most important moment of her life Vera Wang envelops her in a misty cloud of pure joy that she remembers with a soft smile for years after.

column17:
Vera Wang Truly Pink Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.5000

Heavenly and scintillating Vera Wang Truly Pink turns any woman into an enchanting damsel awaiting her special moment. Pretty and pink - this luxury scent is the embodiment of an elegant and sophisticated woman who wholeheartedly embraces her femininity. An Eau de Parfum that stands the test of time with its classic and lovely aroma.

Floral hints of freesia gently intermingling with spicy hints of cassia and the delicately sweet scent of litchi make up the delectable top note. This is followed by a fragrant heart note with fragrant peony light hints of lily of the valley and the distinctly sweet scent of pink rose. Culminating into the base note you are met with the soft and elegant aroma of iris that tantalises your sense. The fresh and floral scent elevates your mood with the first spritz and can be worn at any time of the day. The glass flacon that holds this beautiful fragrance comes in a pyramidal shape with a clear glass top that sits like a crown jewel. The powdery-pink shade of the scent glimmers through the crystal-clear flacon radiating a gentle feminine charm. Vera Wang Truly Pink exudes a fragrance that is blatantly romantic and charming.

column17:
Vera Wang Bouquet Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.5400

For the woman who dreams of making her charismatic entrance even more joyous the celebrated house of Vera Wang proudly presents the luxury perfume - Bouquet. Delightfully floral and feminine this Eau de Parfum was created to be the ideal scent to accompany the perfect wedding gown. The ultimate expression of flowers and fragrance Bouquet is nothing short of magical.

With the first whiff you are treated to the sweet citrus hint of sicilian bergamot mixed with the strong smell of black currant leaves. This alluring waft is followed by the heart note that is an infusion of musky hints of white narcissus and luscious honeysuckle. Finally the base note delivers a symphony of aromas that comprises of soothingly fresh lavender accords deep musk moroccan cedarwood and earthy hints of white orris roots. The combination of floral and woody accords lift your spirits with its refreshing scent. You can wear this fragrance at any time and get enraptured in its pleasing air. This enchanting perfume is encased in a dainty pyramidal shaped bottle that is subtly reminiscent of the delicate pleats of a wedding gown. The fresh and minty green colour of the perfume radiates through the glass bottle and looks as beautiful as it smells fragrant. A spritz of Vera Wang Bouquet and you can transform yourself into a truly captivating bride.
